caster:vfx.NAME: Vfx Test
caster:vfx.DESCRIPTION: This skill should not appear in game, it's for testing!

caster:Ashes.NAME: Ashes
caster:Ashes.DESCRIPTION: Exhausts when drawn, add a random card into your hand.

caster:Channeling.NAME: Channeling
caster:Channeling.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you've played a Spell this turn: Gain !M! additional Block.

caster:DivertMana.NAME: Divert Mana
caster:DivertMana.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! additional Block for each spell you're currently casting. NL Add 1 caster:Cast_Time to all Spells you are currently casting.

caster:FocusMana.NAME: Focus Mana
caster:FocusMana.DESCRIPTION: Increase the base damage and block of all Spells you are currently casting by !M!. Draw 1 card.

caster:TapMana.NAME: Tap Mana
caster:TapMana.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the base damage and block of all Spells you are currently casting by !M!. NL Reduce the caster:Cast_Time of all Spells you are currently casting by !M!.

caster:PhoenixFlare.NAME: Phoenix Flare
caster:PhoenixFlare.DESCRIPTION: caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage. NL At the start of your turn, if this card is in your exhaust pile, put it in your hand. NL Exhaust.

caster:GigaDrain.NAME: Giga Drain
caster:GigaDrain.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Heal HP equal to 25% of unblocked damage dealt.

caster:Gain.NAME: Gain
caster:Gain.DESCRIPTION: Every time you caster:Electrify 4 cards, gain !M! Focus.

caster:WallOfMirrors.NAME: Wall Of Mirrors
caster:WallOfMirrors.DESCRIPTION: Prevent and reflect all damage dealt by target enemy this turn. NL Exhaust.

caster:WallOfRocks.NAME: Wall Of Rocks
caster:WallOfRocks.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Weak to ALL attacking enemies.

caster:DiamondDust.NAME: Diamond Dust
caster:DiamondDust.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Increase this card's Block by !M! this combat.

caster:Bzzzt.NAME: BZZZT
caster:Bzzzt.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you have no *Energy. NL Gain [E]. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

caster:GateOfBabylon.NAME: Gate of Babylon
caster:GateOfBabylon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for every caster:unique_spell in your deck.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for every caster:unique_spell in your deck. NL Unique Spells: !M!

caster:Tundra.NAME: Tundra
caster:Tundra.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Apply !M! Vulnerable and deal !caster:D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

caster:LightningBolt.NAME: Lightning Bolt
caster:LightningBolt.DESCRIPTION: caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage. NL Draw !M! card.

caster:Thundara.NAME: Thundara
caster:Thundara.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the cost of a random Spell in your hand to 0 this turn. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage !M! times. NL Cannot be Upgraded.

caster:Conflagrate.NAME: Conflagrate
caster:Conflagrate.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you caster:Freeze this card, caster:Thaw up to !M! cards. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage. NL Apply !caster:M2! caster:Blazed.

caster:Shatter.NAME: Shatter
caster:Shatter.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has caster:Frost deal !D! damage !M! more times.

caster:MegaloSpark.NAME: Megalo Spark
caster:MegaloSpark.DESCRIPTION: caster:Electrify !M! random card in your hand. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage to ALL enemies twice.
caster:MegaloSpark.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: caster:Electrify !M! card in your hand. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage to ALL enemies twice.

caster:AbsoluteZero.NAME: Absolute Zero
caster:AbsoluteZero.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever Freezing this card, double its base damage this combat.

caster:StaticField.NAME: Static Field
caster:StaticField.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you caster:Electrify a card gain !M! Block.

caster:Discharge.NAME: Discharge
caster:Discharge.DESCRIPTION: Remove ALL caster:Electrify from ALL cards in your hand. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for each stack removed.

caster:Kindling.NAME: Kindling
caster:Kindling.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy has caster:Blazed apply !M! caster:Blazed. NL Apply !M! caster:Blazed. NL Draw !caster:M2! card.
caster:Kindling.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If the enemy has caster:Blazed apply !M! caster:Blazed. NL Apply !M! caster:Blazed. NL Draw !caster:M2! cards.

caster:Surge.NAME: Surge
caster:Surge.DESCRIPTION: caster:Electrify !caster:M2! random card in your hand. NL Gain [E].
caster:Surge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: caster:Electrify !caster:M2! random cards in your hand. NL Gain [E] [E].

caster:Congeal.NAME: Congeal
caster:Congeal.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! caster:Frost to ALL enemies. NL Whenever you play a Spell this turn, gain !caster:M2! Block.

caster:Permafrost.NAME: Permafrost
caster:Permafrost.DESCRIPTION: Add 1 caster:Cast_Time to all Spells you are currently casting. NL Gain !B! Block: equal to twice the sum of their caster:Cast_Time. NL Next turn, gain half that amount.
caster:Permafrost.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Add 1 caster:Cast_Time to all Spells you are currently casting. NL Gain !B! Block: equal to twice the sum of their caster:Cast_Time. NL Next turn, gain half that amount.

caster:FreezeInHell.NAME: Freeze In Hell
caster:FreezeInHell.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, Apply !M! caster:Frost to ALL enemies.

caster:FlashSpeed.NAME: Flash Speed
caster:FlashSpeed.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Gain !B! Block. NL caster:Electrify !caster:M2! random card in your hand.

caster:VoltTackle.NAME: Volt Tackle
caster:VoltTackle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL caster:Electrify this card !M! times.

caster:FlashFrost.NAME: Flash Frost
caster:FlashFrost.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Apply !M! caster:Frost. NL Exhaust.

caster:JupitelThunder.NAME: Jupitel Thunder
caster:JupitelThunder.DESCRIPTION: caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage !M! times. NL Hits 1 extra time for every card played after playing this

caster:AshesToAshes.NAME: Ashes to Ashes
caster:AshesToAshes.DESCRIPTION: Heal HP equal to the number of cards in your exhaust pile. NL Exhaust.

caster:Incinerate.NAME: Incinerate
caster:Incinerate.DESCRIPTION: caster:Burn !M! card in your hand. NL Apply caster:Blazed equal to !caster:M2! times its cost.

caster:PyroclasticTide.NAME: Pyroclastic Tide
caster:PyroclasticTide.DESCRIPTION: Increase the damage of ALL fire Spells by !M! this combat. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage to ALL enemies.

caster:NaturalChaos.NAME: Natural Chaos
caster:NaturalChaos.DESCRIPTION: caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Apply !M! caster:Mired to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

caster:GaiasBlessing.NAME: Gaia's Blessing
caster:GaiasBlessing.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Regen. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Gain !M! Regen. NL Exhaust.

caster:Ifrit.NAME: Ifrit
caster:Ifrit.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, caster:Burn a random card in your hand and play it. NL Apply 4 caster:Blazed to a random enemy.

caster:Electroplating.NAME: Electroplating
caster:Electroplating.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card from your hand, caster:Electrify it !caster:M2! times. NL Gain !M! *Plated *Armor.

caster:Thermodynamics.NAME: Thermodynamics
caster:Thermodynamics.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you caster:Freeze a card, gain !M! Block. NL Whenever you caster:Thaw a card, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

caster:AlternatingCurrent.NAME: Alternating Current
caster:AlternatingCurrent.DESCRIPTION: caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage to a random enemy.

caster:Accumulation.NAME: Accumulation
caster:Accumulation.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block for each Spell currently being casted. NL Currently: gain !B! Block.

caster:MagicResonance.NAME: Magic Resonance
caster:MagicResonance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each Spell you are currently casting.

caster:MagicAttunement.NAME: Magic Attunement
caster:MagicAttunement.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a *Soul *Strike to your hand.

caster:SoulStrike.NAME: Soul Strike
caster:SoulStrike.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage. NL Exhaust.

caster:Fissure.NAME: Fissure
caster:Fissure.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Stun to ALL enemies. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage to ALL Enemies. NL Exhaust.

caster:Susanoo.NAME: Susano'o
caster:Susanoo.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Remove ALL caster:Electrify from your hand, deck, and discard pile. NL Deals !M! additional damage for each stack removed.

caster:Explosion.NAME: Explosion
caster:Explosion.DESCRIPTION: caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage. NL Reduce this card's damage by !M! for this combat.

caster:FireWall.NAME: Fire Wall
caster:FireWall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Lose !M! HP. NL caster:Thaw !caster:M2! card.

caster:Fireball.NAME: Fireball
caster:Fireball.DESCRIPTION: caster:Thaw !M! card. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage.

caster:ShivasGrace.NAME: Shiva's Grace
caster:ShivasGrace.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you caster:Freeze a card, gain !M! *Plated *Armor.

caster:MagicWeapon.NAME: Magic Weapon
caster:MagicWeapon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards, discard all non-Spells drawn this way.

caster:Illusion.NAME: Illusion
caster:Illusion.DESCRIPTION: Change the enemy intent to Block this round. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!

caster:StormGust.NAME: Storm Gust
caster:StormGust.DESCRIPTION: caster:Freeze !M! cards. caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Apply !caster:M2! caster:Frost to ALL enemies.
caster:StormGust.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: caster:Freeze !M! card. caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Apply !caster:M2! caster:Frost to ALL enemies.

caster:Eruption.NAME: Eruption
caster:Eruption.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add !M! *Lava to your hand.

caster:Fira.NAME: Fira
caster:Fira.DESCRIPTION: Deals !M! additional damage for every turn you've been in combat. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage. NL Cannot be Upgraded.

caster:SpontaneousCombustion.NAME: Spontaneous Combustion
caster:SpontaneousCombustion.DESCRIPTION: Deal !caster:D! damage. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage !M! times to the enemy with the lowest HP.

caster:LordOfVermillion.NAME: Lord Of Vermillion
caster:LordOfVermillion.DESCRIPTION: caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage to a random enemy !M! [#F7FF00]x[] X times.

caster:Sleet.NAME: Sleet
caster:Sleet.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card and gain !B! Block for each enemy in combat.

caster:MeteorStorm.NAME: Meteor Storm
caster:MeteorStorm.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle !M! zero cost Meteors into your draw pile.

caster:ManaOverflow.NAME: Mana Overflow
caster:ManaOverflow.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an elemental Spell add a *Soul *Strike to your hand.
caster:ManaOverflow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you play an elemental Spell add a *Soul *Strike to your hand.

caster:Charge.NAME: Charge
caster:Charge.DESCRIPTION: Add a *Shocked into your draw pile, then draw !M! cards.

caster:Sandstorm.NAME: Sandstorm
caster:Sandstorm.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength for 1 turn and gain 1 caster:Mired. NL Lose !caster:M2! Focus until the end of next turn.

caster:Heavy.NAME: Heavy
caster:Heavy.DESCRIPTION: Gain !caster:B! Block. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal damage to ALL enemies equal to the damage you blocked last round. NL Cannot be Upgraded.

caster:Slick.NAME: Slick
caster:Slick.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Blur. NL Draw 2 cards. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Gain !caster:B! Block. NL Cannot be Upgraded.

caster:WallOfSwords.NAME: Wall Of Swords
caster:WallOfSwords.DESCRIPTION: caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Lose up to !M! Block, gain that much Thorns. NL Exhaust.

caster:WallOfAsh.NAME: Wall Of Ash
caster:WallOfAsh.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Shuffle *Ashes into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

caster:Demi.NAME: Demi
caster:Demi.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Remove ALL Block from the enemy. NL It loses !M! % of its current HP. NL Exhaust.

caster:Elementalize.NAME: Elementalize
caster:Elementalize.DESCRIPTION: Choose a Spell in your hand. NL Gain [E] for every Spell in your hand with the same Element.

caster:Unearth.NAME: Unearth
caster:Unearth.DESCRIPTION: Fetch !M! Spell from your draw pile, then restore HP equal to its energy cost. NL Exhaust.
caster:Unearth.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Fetch !M! Spell from your draw pile, then restore HP equal to double its energy cost. NL Exhaust.

caster:GlacialShield.NAME: Glacial Shield
caster:GlacialShield.DESCRIPTION: caster:Freeze !M! random card in your hand. NL Gain !caster:B! Block. caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Gain !caster:B! Block.
caster:GlacialShield.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: caster:Freeze !M! card in your hand. NL Gain !caster:B! Block. caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Gain !caster:B! Block.

caster:Ramuh.NAME: Ramuh
caster:Ramuh.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you caster:Electrify a card, reduce its cost by 1 for the turn.
caster:Ramuh.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you caster:Electrify a card, reduce its cost by 1 for the turn.

caster:Inferno.NAME: Inferno
caster:Inferno.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, apply !M! caster:Blazed to ALL enemies.

caster:Embers.NAME: Embers
caster:Embers.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the start of your turn, if this card is caster:Frozen caster:Thaw it, gain [E] and caster:Thaw up to !M! cards.
caster:Embers.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the start of your turn, if this card is caster:Frozen caster:Thaw it, gain [E] [E] and caster:Thaw up to !M! cards.

caster:Sultry.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When you draw this card draw !caster:M2! card and caster:Thaw !M! card.
caster:Sultry.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: caster:Thaw up to !M! cards. NL When you draw this card draw !caster:M2! card.

caster:BurnItDown.NAME: Burn It Down
caster:BurnItDown.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Add a *Wall *of *Ash into your discard pile. NL Exhaust.
caster:BurnItDown.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Add a *Wall *of *Ash+ into your discard pile. NL Exhaust.

caster:Rectify.NAME: Rectify
caster:Rectify.DESCRIPTION: Choose an element, get a random Spell of that element. NL Exhaust.
caster:Rectify.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose an element, get a random Spell of that element, it costs 0 for this turn. NL Exhaust.

caster:IcicleLance.NAME: Icicle Lance
caster:IcicleLance.DESCRIPTION: caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Remove all Block from the enemy, then deal !caster:D! damage twice.

caster:Cryogenesis.NAME: Cryogenesis
caster:Cryogenesis.DESCRIPTION: caster:Freeze ALL cards in your hand. NL Draw !M! card for each card caster:Frozen this way. NL Exhaust.
caster:Cryogenesis.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: caster:Freeze ALL cards in your hand. NL Draw !M! cards for each card caster:Frozen this way. NL Exhaust.

caster:BloodRitual.NAME: Blood Ritual
caster:BloodRitual.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Decrease the caster:Cast_Time of all your currently casted Spells by !caster:M2! NL Exhaust.

caster:IzanagisObdurance.NAME: Izanagi's Obdurance
caster:IzanagisObdurance.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Block, gain !M! Temporary_HP.

caster:ShortenedChant.NAME: Shortened Chant
caster:ShortenedChant.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the caster:Cast_Time of your Spells by !M!.

caster:EchoingVoice.NAME: Echoing Voice
caster:EchoingVoice.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next Spell is played twice.
caster:EchoingVoice.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next !M! Spells are played twice.

caster:SunGoddessAmaterasu.NAME: Sun Goddess Amaterasu
caster:SunGoddessAmaterasu.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Fire Spell, increase its damage by !M! % this combat.
caster:SunGoddessAmaterasu.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you play a Fire Spell, increase its damage by !M! % this combat.

caster:Incantation.NAME: Incantation
caster:Incantation.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, reduce the caster:Cast_Time of a random Spell in your hand by 1.
caster:Incantation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, reduce the caster:Cast_Time of 2 random Spells in your hand by 1.

caster:QuickCast.NAME: Quick Cast
caster:QuickCast.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the caster:Cast_Time of a random spell in your hand by !M! until it's played.
caster:QuickCast.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Reduce the caster:Cast_Time of a spell in your hand by !M! until it's played.

caster:WallOfThorns.NAME: Wall Of Thorns
caster:WallOfThorns.DESCRIPTION: Gain !caster:B! Block twice. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Gain !caster:B! Block and !M! Thorns.

caster:DivertFocus.NAME: Divert Focus
caster:DivertFocus.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Lose !M! Focus until the end of next turn.

caster:BookThrow.NAME: Book Throw
caster:BookThrow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength for the rest of this turn.

caster:Cool.NAME: Chill
caster:Cool.DESCRIPTION: caster:Freeze 1 card. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:M2! damage for each card Frozen this combat, currently: !caster:D! damage. NL Cast *Frostbite.
caster:Cool.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: caster:Freeze 1 card. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:M2! damage for each card Frozen this combat, currently: !caster:D! damage. NL Cast *Frostbite+.

caster:Frostbite.NAME: Frostbite

caster:Frostbite.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:M2! damage to ALL enemies for each card Frozen this combat, currently: !caster:D! damage. NL Cast *Fimbulvetr+.

caster:Fimbulvetr.NAME: Fimbulvetr
caster:Fimbulvetr.DESCRIPTION: caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:M2! damage to ALL enemies for each card Frozen this combat, currently: !caster:D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

caster:Superconduct.NAME: Superconduct
caster:Superconduct.DESCRIPTION: caster:Electrify !caster:M2! random cards in your hand. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay! - X: NL Deal !caster:D! damage !M! times.

caster:IceWall.NAME: Ice Wall
caster:IceWall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Block is not removed at the start of your next turn. NL Exhaust.
caster:IceWall.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Block is not removed at the start of your next turn. NL caster:Freeze this card.

caster:PackedIce.NAME: Packed Ice
caster:PackedIce.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block, then if you have !caster:M2! or more Block apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

caster:MagicScroll.NAME: Magic Scroll
caster:MagicScroll.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card, reduce the Cast Time of any Spells drawn this way by !caster:M2! for this turn.

caster:Direct.NAME: Direct
caster:Direct.DESCRIPTION: Fetch !M! card that costs 0 from your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

caster:Mirage.NAME: Mirage
caster:Mirage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL When you play this card, return it to your hand and it gains Retain for this turn.

caster:HeatRay.NAME: Heat Ray
caster:HeatRay.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Decrease this card's damage by !M! this combat.

caster:Shocked.NAME: Shocked
caster:Shocked.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When this is drawn, caster:Electrify all cards in your hand. NL Ethereal.

caster:BurnOut.NAME: Burn Out
caster:BurnOut.DESCRIPTION: Double an enemy's caster:Blazed, next time caster:Blazed is triggered the enemy loses all caster:Blazed stacks. NL Exhaust.
caster:BurnOut.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Double an enemy's caster:Blazed, next time caster:Blazed is triggered the enemy loses all caster:Blazed stacks.

caster:Lava.NAME: Lava
caster:Lava.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL While this is in your hand, Fire Attacks and Spells deal !M! more damage. NL This turn Fire Attack and Spells deal !caster:M2! more damage. NL Exhaust.

caster:SuperCool.NAME: Super Cool
caster:SuperCool.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL All cards in your hand gain: caster:Freeze this card when it's played.

caster:Avalanche.NAME: Avalanche
caster:Avalanche.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to All enemies. NL Shuffle !M! *Snowed into your draw pile.
caster:Avalanche.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to All enemies. NL Shuffle !M! *Snowed+ into your draw pile.

caster:Snowed.NAME: Snowed
caster:Snowed.DESCRIPTION: When drawn gain !M! Block. NL Exhaust.

caster:Igloo.NAME: Igloo
caster:Igloo.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

caster:MatchBox.NAME: Match Box
caster:MatchBox.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

caster:WallOfLightning.NAME: Wall Of Lightning
caster:WallOfLightning.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Costs 1 less energy for each time you caster:Electrified a card this combat.
